name: The Sultan's Labyrinth
summary: A hidden object game. Long ago in ancient Persia, Sultan Bahar`s rule inspired the minds of his followers. Although, it was his fair and beautiful daughter, Princess Sadira, who captured their hearts. Can you help Sultan Bahar find a suitable prince for his royal daughter? Each prince must demonstrate his wisdom by solving puzzles within the Sultan`s Labyrinth. In a grueling Hidden Object-themed competition, who will defeat the Sultan`s Labyrinth?
